extracted_data_phrases: by failing to respect their authority and wisdom

extracted_data_phrases: in exercising power or authority over them
oppression.question: Have I mistreated, harassed, or discriminated against others through my deeds in exercising power or authority over them?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

envy.question: Have I inwardly resented others' successes, and privately wished they would lose them?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: in using words to offend , degrade , or demean others
incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control in using words to offend, degrade, or demean others?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in speaking to others using words that were unbecoming of my Christian character
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control in speaking to others using words that were unbecoming of my Christian character?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Have I overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
like golfing , gardening , or walking / hiking
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially when enjoying leisure activities like golfing, gardening, or walking/hiking?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in my leisure activities or dining habits
in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did I, in my leisure activities or dining habits, overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in excessive and wasteful spending on leisure activities at the expense of my financial obligations or family needs
at the expense of my financial obligations or family needs
of my financial obligations or family needs
prodigality.question: Have I indulged in excessive and wasteful spending on leisure activities at the expense of my financial obligations or family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I recklessly prioritized my discretionary income over essential expenses, putting family needs at risk?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: on leisure activities that take precedence over my financial obligations
prodigality.question: Have I been excessively and wastefully spending on leisure activities that take precedence over my financial obligations, potentially harming my ability to provide for myself or others in need.
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in interactions with family , friends , or colleagues
on issues related to leisure activities , hobbies , or career pursuits
to leisure activities , hobbies , or career pursuits
anger.question: Have I nursed anger or held onto feelings of rage rather than seeking reconciliation in interactions with family, friends, or colleagues when they disagreed with me on issues related to leisure activities, hobbies, or career pursuits?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
